pullRequest.title: fixed #810: efficient sorted set seeking
pullRequest.bodyText: reworked the sorted sets to allow for seeking by using the tailSet method.

commit.message:
fixed #810: efficient sorted set seeking
* reworked the sorted sets to allow for seeking by using the tailSet method.

nodes.bodyText: Should the number of objects to verify be configurable? Not in this pr, but as a general comment.
Are we sure we want to double the length of the array? ArrayList resizes with (size + size/2).
There's an opportunity for a try-with-resources block here

commit.message:
re #810: review comment updates.  Includes parameterizing the persist
verification options.
